TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfessionalColors extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides structures that are colors of a Windows display element. This class cannot be inherited.
Docs.related: How To: Create and Set a Custom Renderer for the ToolStrip Control in Windows Forms
